alert.note: Alert for Coastal Collier County; Hendry; Inland Broward County; Inland Collier County; Inland Miami-Dade County; Mainland Monroe (Florida) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued September 06 at 5:57PM EDT by NWS Miami
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of southeastern Collier, north central Mainland Monroe and central Broward Counties through 645 PM EDT... At 557 PM EDT, National Weather Service meteorologists were tracking a strong thunderstorm capable of producing a funnel cloud 7 miles north of Big Cypress National Preserve, or 26 miles northeast of Everglades City, moving west at 15 mph. HAZARD...Funnel clouds and winds in excess of 40 mph. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Funnel clouds occasionally touch down and produce tornadoes or waterspouts. Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Locations impacted include... Big Cypress National Preserve, Miccosukee Indian Reservation, Miccosukee Service Plaza, Copeland, Jerome and Deep Lake. FUNNEL CLOUD...POSSIBLE MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: These winds can down small tree limbs and branches, and blow around unsecured small objects. Seek shelter in a safe building until the storm passes. Funnel clouds occasionally touch down and produce tornadoes or waterspouts. Move indoors and stay away from windows.

area.areaDesc: Coastal Collier County; Hendry; Inland Broward County; Inland Collier County; Inland Miami-Dade County; Mainland Monroe
